author: bsunanda
body:
### PR description:

Add a facility to dump information of all touchables of ECAL to compare between DDD and DD4Hep

#### PR validation:

Tested using the cfg's in the test areas of SimG4CMS/Calo

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex27 Add a facility to dump information of all touchables of ECAL to compare between DDD and DD4Hep
